name: Touhou Fangame ~ Incident In Scarlet Mansion - The Lost Tome A
name_original: Touhou Fangame ~ Incident In Scarlet Mansion - The Lost Tome A
description:
---MANUAL--------------------------------------------------------

This is the 1st part of my 5th touhou fangame!
This game contains stages 1-4 (part 2 is in the making).

---Controls-----------------------------------------------------------

Press X to skip the intro.

Move with the arrows

Shoot with Z

Focus with X

Bomb with SPACE BAR

---Modes-------------------------------------------------------------

# START

   Play the game normally on the difficulty you choose and with the character you want.

# VIEW

  Same with START but your lives here have no meaning. It's for practice or for the story.

# CREDITS

  View the creators of this game.

# MUSIC

  Listen to songs that can be found in the game.

#  STORY

  Here you can find out what happened before the game...

#  QUIT

   The Classic useless quit button.

---Other Information---------------------------------------

Get power items to increase your range.

Get point items to get score.

The enemies have no hitbox.

Some bullets/lassers can 1 hit K.O. you. Be careful! (stage 3)

Touhou project belongs to Team Shanghai Alice (Zun)

Some music belongs to Team Shanghai Alice (Zun)

Some music belongs to StarX

The characters belong to Team Shanghai Alice (Zun)

Official touhou website: http://www16.big.or.jp/~zun/

Other pictures in game belong to their rightful owners.

---Extra Questions?---------------------------------------------

In game you will be asked to choose what your character will say. Depending on your answer you may get a "Game Over" So be careful.
